addonCore.label: Automated Trading System Development with MATLAB
addonCore.summary: How to Build an Event-based Automated Trading System in MATLAB
addonCore.description:
Files used in the webinar - Automated Trading System Development with MATLAB broadcast on August 20, 2015. This webinar can be viewed at http://www.mathworks.com/videos/search.html?q=automated+trading Specific topics include:
* Data gathering options, including daily historic, intraday, and real-time data * Model building and prototyping in MATLAB * Back testing, walk forward testing, and calibrating a model * Event handling in MATLAB (Streaming data)
It is recommended that you watch the webinar to see the "live" system running.
Other Requirements
None.
